participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Energetic and competitive, Emily enjoys physical activities and has a strong sense of personal style.
participant_1.background: i dance on the weekends. i compete in dog agility classes. i don't care about fashion. i hate the color orange.

participant_2.name: Oliver
participant_2.personality: Playful and wise, Oliver has a youthful spirit despite his age and enjoys the finer things in life.
participant_2.background: i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i am very strong for my age. i'm 100 years old. i feel like i might live forever.
